Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav cracked a 28-ball 53 to set India up for a convincing 47-run win over Afghanistan.
Jasprit Bumrah claimed three for seven.
Rashid Khan took three wickets for 26 runs.
Fazalhaq Farooqi took three wickets for 33 runs.
Arshdeep Singh took two wickets for 34 runs.
Kuldeep Yadav took two wickets for 32 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named the player of the match for his fifty.
India relished their victory while Afghanistan faced a challenging run-rate for their upcoming games against Bangladesh and Australia.
